attributes.action: England national football team to also play in the north of the country.
attributes.additional_details:
England national football team play there games solely at Wembley Stadium in London.

I believe that England should take their games to the road and alternate between two stadiums; stay with Wembley and also and additional stadium up North.

We can not decide where up north this would happen but w cam definitely get the ball rolling. An idea could be to see where fans would want the second stadium to be and then the other ideas what stadiums and clubs would be open to the idea.

Wembley have a huge debt to pay off but the fans who are having to pay these ridiculous should not have to suffer.

Please sign.

rejection.details: This is for the Football Association to decide.
